TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParamArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ParamArrayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ParamArrayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示方法在调用中将允许参数的数目可变。

span.span: Indicates that a method will allow a variable number of arguments in its invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示方法参数是参数数组。The indicates that a method parameter is a parameter array. 参数数组允许指定数量未知的参数。A parameter array allows the specification of an unknown number of arguments. 参数数组必须是形参表中的最后一个形参, 并且必须是一维数组。A parameter array must be the last parameter in a formal parameter list, and it must be a single-dimension array. 调用方法时, 参数数组允许使用以下两种方法之一来指定方法的参数:When the method is called, a parameter array permits arguments to a method to be specified in either of two ways: - 作为可隐式转换为参数数组类型的类型的单个表达式。As a single expression of a type that is implicitly convertible to the parameter array type. 参数数组作为值参数。The parameter array functions as a value parameter. - 作为零个或多个参数, 其中每个参数都是可隐式转换为参数数组元素类型的类型的表达式。As zero or more arguments, where each argument is an expression of a type that is implicitly convertible to the type of the parameter array element. 下一节中的示例说明了这两种调用约定。The example in the next section illustrates both calling conventions. > [!NOTE] > 通常, 不会直接在代码中使用。Typically, the is not used directly in code. 相反, 各语言`ParamArray`关键字 (如 Visual Basic 和`params`中C#的) 用作类的包装。Instead, individual language keywords, such as `ParamArray` in Visual Basic and `params` in C#, are used as wrappers for the class. 某些语言 (例如C#) 甚至可能需要使用 language 关键字, 禁止使用。 Some languages, such as C#, may even require the use of the language keyword and prohibit the use of . 在重载解析过程中, 当支持参数数组的编译器遇到不存在但其参数比包含参数数组的重载少一个的方法重载时, 它们会将方法替换为包含参数数组。During overload resolution, when compilers that support parameter arrays encounter a method overload that does not exist but has one fewer parameter than an overload that includes a parameter array, they will replace the method with the overload that includes the parameter array. 例如, 对`String.Split()`实例方法 ( 该类中不存在) 的调用被解析为对方法的调用。For example, a call to the `String.Split()` instance method (which does not exist in the class) is resolved as a call to the method. 编译器还会将所需类型的空数组传递给方法。The compiler will also pass an empty array of the required type to the method. 这意味着, 在处理参数数组中的元素时, 该方法必须始终准备好处理长度为零的数组。This means that the method must always be prepared to handle an array whose length is zero when it processes the elements in the parameter array. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. 有关使用特性的详细信息, 请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个`Temperature` `Display`包含方法的类, 该方法旨在显示一个或多个格式化的温度值。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that includes a `Display` method, which is intended to display one or more formatted temperature values. 方法具有一个参数, `formats`该参数定义为参数数组。The method has a single parameter, `formats`, which is defined as a parameter array. [!code-csharp[System.ParamArrayAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ParamArrayAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/vb/Example.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示对方法的`Temperature.Display`三个不同调用。The following example illustrates three different calls to the `Temperature.Display` method. 在第一种方法中, 向方法传递格式字符串数组。In the first, the method is passed an array of format strings. 在第二个中, 方法将四个单独的格式字符串作为参数传递。In the second, the method is passed four individual format strings as arguments. 在第三种情况下, 不带参数调用方法。In the third, the method is called with no arguments. 如示例的输出所示, Visual Basic 和C#编译器会将其转换为具有空字符串数组`Display`的方法调用。As the output from the example illustrates, the Visual Basic and C# compilers translate this into a call to the `Display` method with an empty string array. [!code-csharp[System.ParamArrayAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/cs/Example.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ParamArrayAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/vb/Example.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用默认属性初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default properties.
